mapper.select: select Project.project_id, project_name, project_introduction, project_number_limit, project_instructions, Course.course_id, COUNT(group_id) - 1 as group_number from Project, Course, `Group` where Project.course_id = Course.course_id AND Project.project_id = `Group`.project_id AND Project.course_id = #{course_id} GROUP BY Project.project_id
